content: Looks like someone wrote an LSP proxy that allows sharing rust-analyzer instances between editor instances: https://github.com/pr2502/ra-multiplex
Yeah, I saw it in r-a#4712. I didn't test it, but thought it might be nice to feature it (as a third-party project) in one of the changelogs

Hello, I would like to contribute to this issue :
https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/11448
I have a working patch for it but i dont know how to propose a patch
Looks like you found out :grinning:
@Laurențiu i was looking for some kind of "How to contribute" document

There's a style guide at https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/blob/master/docs/dev/style.md, but otherwise it's just plain GitHub. We aren't too strict on commit message style or anything else.
